00010 /**
00011  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00012  */
00013 class CssTokenTest extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00014   public function testName() {
00015     
00016     $this->assertEquals('character', (CssToken::name(0)));
00017     $this->assertEquals('a legal non-alphanumeric character', (CssToken::name(99)));
00018     $this->assertEquals('end of file', (CssToken::name(FALSE)));
00019     $this->assertEquals(0, strpos(CssToken::name(22),'illegal character'));
00020   }
00021 }

00030   var $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00031   <html>
00032   <head>
00033     <title>This is the title</title>
00034   </head>
00035   <body>
00036     <div id="one">
00037       <div id="two" class="class-one">
00038         <div id="three">
00039         Inner text.
00040         </div>
00041       </div>
00042     </div>
00043     <span class="class-two">Nada</span>
00044     <p><p><p><p><p><p><p class="Odd"><p>8</p></p></p></p></p></p></p></p>
00045     <ul>
00046       <li class="Odd" id="li-one">Odd</li>
00047       <li class="even" id="li-two">Even</li>
00048       <li class="Odd" id="li-three">Odd</li>
00049       <li class="even" id="li-four">Even</li>
00050       <li class="Odd" id="li-five">Odd</li>
00051       <li class="even" id="li-six">Even</li>
00052       <li class="Odd" id="li-seven">Odd</li>
00053       <li class="even" id="li-eight">Even</li>
00054       <li class="Odd" id="li-nine">Odd</li>
00055       <li class="even" id="li-ten">Even</li>
00056     </ul>
00057   </body>
00058   </html>
00059   ';
00060   
00061   private function firstMatch($matches) {
00062     $matches->rewind();
00063     return $matches->current();
00064   }
00065   private function nthMatch($matches, $n = 0) {
00066     foreach ($matches as $m) {
00067       if ($matches->key() == $n) return $m;
00068     }
00069   }
00070   
00071   public function testGetMatches() {
00072     // Test root element:
00073     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?><test><inside/>Text<inside/></test>';
00074     $doc = new DomDocument();
00075     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00076     
00077     // Test handing it a DOM Document
00078     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00079     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00080     $this->assertTrue($matches->count() == 1);
00081     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00082     $this->assertEquals('test', $match->tagName);
00083 
00084     // Test handling single element
00085     $root = $doc->documentElement;
00086     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($root);
00087     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00088     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00089     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00090     $this->assertEquals('test', $match->tagName);
00091     
00092     // Test handling a node list
00093     $eles = $doc->getElementsByTagName('inside');
00094     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($eles);
00095     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00096     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00097     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00098     $this->assertEquals('inside', $match->tagName);
00099     
00100     // Test handling an array of elements
00101     $eles = $doc->getElementsByTagName('inside');
00102     $array = array();
00103     foreach ($eles as $ele) $array[] = $ele;
00104     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($array);
00105     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00106     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00107     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00108     $this->assertEquals('inside', $match->tagName);
00109   }

00114   public function testEmptySelector() {

00118

00121     $handler->find('');

00123     $this->assertEquals(0, $matches->count());

00126   public function testElementNS() {
00127     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?><t:test xmlns:t="urn:foo/bar"><t:inside id="first"/>Text<t:inside/><inside/></t:test>';
00128     $doc = new DomDocument();
00129     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00130 
00131     // Basic test
00132     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00133     $handler->find('t|inside');
00134     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00135     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00136     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00137     $this->assertEquals('t:inside', $match->tagName);
00138     
00139     // Basic test
00140     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00141     $handler->find('t|test');
00142     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00143     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00144     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00145     $this->assertEquals('t:test', $match->tagName);

00164     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00165 
00166     // Basic test
00167     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00168     $handler->find('inside');
00169     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00170     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00171     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00172     $this->assertEquals('inside', $match->tagName);
00173     
00174     $doc = new DomDocument();
00175     $doc->loadXML($this->xml);
00176 
00177     // Test getting nested
00178     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00179     $handler->find('div');
00180     $matches = $handler->getMatches();

00183     $this->assertEquals('div', $match->tagName);
00184     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00185     
00186     // Test getting a list
00187     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00188     $handler->find('li');
00189     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00190     $this->assertEquals(10, $matches->count());

00192     //$this->assertEquals('div', $match->tagName);
00193     $this->assertEquals('li-one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00194     
00195     // Test getting the root element
00196     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00197     $handler->find('html');
00198     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00199     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());

00263     $doc = new DomDocument();
00264     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00265     
00266     // Test handing it a DOM Document
00267     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00268     $handler->find('*');
00269     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00270     
00271     $this->assertEquals(3, $matches->count());
00272     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00273     $this->assertEquals('test', $match->tagName);
00274     
00275     $doc = new DomDocument();
00276     $doc->loadXML($this->xml);
00277     
00278     // Test handing it a DOM Document
00279     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00280     $handler->find('#two *');
00281     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00282     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00283     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00284     $this->assertEquals('three', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00285     
00286     // Regression for issue #30
00287     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00288     $handler->find('#one>*');
00289     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00290     
00291     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count(), 'Should match just top div.');
00292     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00293     $this->assertEquals('two', $match->getAttribute('id'), 'Should match ID #two');
00294   }

00296   public function testElementClass() {
00297     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?><test><inside class="foo" id="one"/>Text<inside/></test>';
00298     $doc = new DomDocument();
00299     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00300     
00301     // Test basic class
00302     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00303     $handler->find('.foo');
00304     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00305     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00306     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00307     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00308     
00309     // Test class in element
00310     $doc = new DomDocument();
00311     $doc->loadXML($this->xml);
00312     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00313     $handler->find('li.Odd');
00314     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00315     $this->assertEquals(5, $matches->count());
00316     $match = $this->nthMatch($matches, 4);
00317     $this->assertEquals('li-nine', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00318     
00319     // Test ID/class combo
00320     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00321     $handler->find('.Odd#li-nine');
00322     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00323     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00324     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00325     $this->assertEquals('li-nine', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00326     
00327   }

00329   public function testDirectDescendant() {
00330     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00331     <test>
00332       <inside class="foo" id="one"/>
00333       Text
00334       <inside id="two">
00335         <inside id="inner-one"/>
00336       </inside>
00337     </test>';
00338     $doc = new DomDocument();
00339     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00340     
00341     // Test direct descendent
00342     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00343     $handler->find('test > inside');
00344     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00345     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00346     $match = $this->nthMatch($matches, 1);
00347     $this->assertEquals('two', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00348

00351   public function testAttribute() {
00352     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?><test><inside id="one" name="antidisestablishmentarianism"/>Text<inside/></test>';
00353     $doc = new DomDocument();
00354     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00355     
00356     // Test match on attr name
00357     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00358     $handler->find('inside[name]');
00359     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00360     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00361     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00362     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00363     
00364      // Test broken form
00365     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00366     $handler->find('inside[@name]');
00367     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00368     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00369     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00370     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00371     
00372     // Test match on attr name and equals value
00373     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00374     $handler->find('inside[name="antidisestablishmentarianism"]');
00375     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00376     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00377     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00378     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00379     
00380     // Test match on containsInString
00381     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00382     $handler->find('inside[name*="disestablish"]');
00383     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00384     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00385     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00386     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00387     
00388     // Test match on beginsWith
00389     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00390     $handler->find('inside[name^="anti"]');
00391     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00392     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00393     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00394     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00395     
00396     // Test match on endsWith
00397     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00398     $handler->find('inside[name$="ism"]');
00399     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00400     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00401     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00402     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00403     
00404     // Test containsWithSpace
00405     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?><test><inside id="one" name="anti dis establishment arian ism"/>Text<inside/></test>';
00406     $doc = new DomDocument();
00407     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00408     
00409     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00410     $handler->find('inside[name~="dis"]');
00411     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00412     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00413     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00414     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00415 
00416     // Test containsWithHyphen
00417     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?><test><inside id="one" name="en-us"/>Text<inside/></test>';
00418     $doc = new DomDocument();
00419     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00420     
00421     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00422     $handler->find('inside[name|="us"]');
00423     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00424     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00425     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00426     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00427     
00428   }

00430   public function testPseudoClassLang() {
00431     
00432     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?><test><inside lang="en-us" id="one"/>Text<inside/></test>';
00433     $doc = new DomDocument();
00434     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00435     
00436     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00437     $handler->find(':lang(en-us)');
00438     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00439     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00440     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00441     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00442     
00443     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00444     $handler->find('inside:lang(en)');
00445     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00446     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());

00448     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00449     
00450     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00451     $handler->find('inside:lang(us)');
00452     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00453     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00454     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00455     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00456

00458     $doc = new DomDocument();
00459     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00460

00467

00471      <inside xml:lang="en-us" id="two"/>

00484   public function testPseudoClassEnabledDisabledChecked() {

00486     <test>
00487      <inside enabled="enabled" id="one"/>Text
00488      <inside disabled="disabled" id="two"/>
00489      <inside checked="FOOOOO" id="three"/>
00490     </test>';
00491     $doc = new DomDocument();
00492     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00493     
00494     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00495     $handler->find(':enabled');
00496     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00497     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00498     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00499     $this->assertEquals('one', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00500     
00501     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00502     $handler->find(':disabled');
00503     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00504     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00505     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00506     $this->assertEquals('two', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00507     
00508     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00509     $handler->find(':checked()');
00510     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00511     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00512     $match = $this->firstMatch($matches);
00513     $this->assertEquals('three', $match->getAttribute('id'));
00514   }

00522   public function testPseudoClassXReset() {
00523     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00524     <test>
00525      <inside enabled="enabled" id="one"/>Text
00526      <inside disabled="disabled" id="two"/>
00527      <inside checked="FOOOOO" id="three"/>
00528     </test>';
00529     $doc = new DomDocument();
00530     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00531

00533     $handler->find('inside');
00534     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00535     $this->assertEquals(3, $matches->count());
00536     $handler->find(':x-reset');
00537     $matches = $handler->getMatches();

00542   public function testPseudoClassRoot() {
00543     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00544     <test>
00545      <inside enabled="enabled" id="one"/>Text
00546      <inside disabled="disabled" id="two"/>
00547      <inside checked="FOOOOO" id="three"/>
00548     </test>';
00549     $doc = new DomDocument();
00550     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00551     $start = $doc->getElementsByTagName('inside');
00552 
00553     // Start "deep in the doc" and traverse backward.
00554     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($start);
00555     $handler->find(':root');
00556     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00557     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00558     $this->assertEquals('test', $this->firstMatch($matches)->tagName);
00559   }

00561   // Test removed so I can re-declare

00563   public function xtestListPeerElements() {
00564     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00565     <test>
00566       <i class="odd" id="one"/>
00567       <i class="even" id="two"/>
00568       <i class="odd" id="three"/>
00569       <i class="even" id="four"/>
00570       <i class="odd" id="five"/>
00571       <e class="even" id="six"/>
00572     </test>';
00573     $doc = new DomDocument();
00574     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00575     
00576     // Test full list
00577     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00578     $handler->find('#one');
00579     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00580     $peers = $handler->listPeerElements($this->firstMatch($matches));
00581     $this->assertEquals(6, count($peers));
00582   }

00605   public function testPseudoClassNthChild() {
00606     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00607     <test>
00608       <i class="odd" id="one"/>
00609       <i class="even" id="two"/>
00610       <i class="odd" id="three"/>
00611       <i class="even" id="four"/>
00612       <i class="odd" id="five"/>
00613       <e class="even" id="six"/>
00614     </test>';
00615     $doc = new DomDocument();
00616     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00617     
00618     // Test full list
00619     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00620     $handler->find(':root :even');
00621     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00622     $this->assertEquals(3, $matches->count());
00623     $this->assertEquals('four', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00624     
00625     // Test restricted to specific element
00626     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00627     $handler->find('i:even');
00628     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00629     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00630     $this->assertEquals('four', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00631     
00632     // Test restricted to specific element, odd this time
00633     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00634     $handler->find('i:odd');
00635     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00636     $this->assertEquals(3, $matches->count());
00637     $this->assertEquals('three', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00638     
00639     // Test nth-child(odd)
00640     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00641     $handler->find('i:nth-child(odd)');
00642     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00643     $this->assertEquals(3, $matches->count());
00644     $this->assertEquals('three', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00645     
00646     // Test nth-child(2n+1)
00647     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00648     $handler->find('i:nth-child(2n+1)');
00649     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00650     $this->assertEquals(3, $matches->count());
00651     $this->assertEquals('three', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00652     
00653     // Test nth-child(2n) (even)
00654     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00655     $handler->find('i:nth-child(2n)');
00656     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00657     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00658     $this->assertEquals('four', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00659     
00660     // Not totally sure what should be returned here
00661     // Test nth-child(-2n) 
00662     // $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00663     //     $handler->find('i:nth-child(-2n)');
00664     //     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00665     //     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00666     //     $this->assertEquals('four', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00667     
00668     // Test nth-child(2n-1) (odd, equiv to 2n + 1)
00669     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00670     $handler->find('i:nth-child(2n-1)');
00671     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00672     $this->assertEquals(3, $matches->count());
00673     $this->assertEquals('three', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00674     
00675     // Test nth-child(4n) (every fourth row)
00676     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00677     $handler->find('i:nth-child(4n)');
00678     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00679     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00680     $this->assertEquals('four', $this->nthMatch($matches, 0)->getAttribute('id'));
00681     
00682     // Test nth-child(4n+1) (first of every four rows)
00683     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00684     $handler->find('i:nth-child(4n+1)');
00685     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00686     // Should match rows one and five
00687     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00688     $this->assertEquals('five', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00689     
00690     // Test nth-child(1) (First row)
00691     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00692     $handler->find('i:nth-child(1)');
00693     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00694     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00695     $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
00696     
00697     // Test nth-child(0n-0) (Empty list)
00698     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00699     $handler->find('i:nth-child(0n-0)');
00700     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00701     $this->assertEquals(0, $matches->count());
00702     
00703     // Test nth-child(-n+3) (First three lines)
00704     // $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00705     // $handler->find('i:nth-child(-n+3)');
00706     // $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00707     // $this->assertEquals(3, $matches->count());
00708     
00709     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00710     <test>
00711       <i class="odd" id="one"/>
00712       <i class="even" id="two"/>
00713       <i class="odd" id="three">
00714         <i class="odd" id="inner-one"/>
00715         <i class="even" id="inner-two"/>
00716       </i>
00717       <i class="even" id="four"/>
00718       <i class="odd" id="five"/>
00719       <e class="even" id="six"/>
00720     </test>';
00721     $doc = new DomDocument();
00722     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00723     
00724     // Test nested items.
00725     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00726     $handler->find('i:nth-child(odd)');
00727     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00728     $this->assertEquals(4, $matches->count());
00729     $matchIDs = array();
00730     foreach ($matches as $m) {
00731       $matchIDs[] = $m->getAttribute('id');
00732     }
00733 //    $matchIDs = sort($matchIDs);
00734     $this->assertEquals(array('one', 'three', 'inner-one', 'five'), $matchIDs);
00735     //$this->assertEquals('inner-one', $matches[3]->getAttribute('id'));
00736     
00737   }
00738   public function testPseudoClassOnlyChild() {
00739     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00740     <test>
00741       <i class="odd" id="one"/>
00742     </test>';
00743     $doc = new DomDocument();
00744     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00745     
00746     // Test single last child.
00747     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00748     $handler->find('i:only-child');
00749     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00750     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00751     $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
00752     
00753     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00754     <test>
00755       <i class="odd" id="one"/>
00756       <i class="odd" id="two"/>
00757     </test>';
00758     $doc = new DomDocument();
00759     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00760     
00761     // Test single last child.
00762     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00763     $handler->find('i:only-child');
00764     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00765     $this->assertEquals(0, $matches->count());
00766     //$this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
00767   }

00803   public function testPseudoClassFirstChild() {
00804     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00805     <test>
00806       <i class="odd" id="one"/>
00807       <i class="even" id="two"/>
00808       <i class="odd" id="three"/>
00809       <i class="even" id="four">
00810         <i class="odd" id="inner-one"/>
00811         <i class="even" id="inner-two"/>
00812         <i class="odd" id="inner-three"/>
00813         <i class="even" id="inner-four"/>
00814       </i>
00815       <i class="odd" id="five"/>
00816       <e class="even" id="six"/>
00817     </test>';
00818     $doc = new DomDocument();
00819     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00820     
00821     // Test single last child.
00822     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00823     $handler->find('#four > i:first-child');
00824     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00825     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00826     $this->assertEquals('inner-one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
00827     
00828     // Test for two last children
00829     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00830     $handler->find('i:first-child');
00831     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00832     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00833     $this->assertEquals('inner-one', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00834   }

00836   public function testPseudoClassLastChild() {
00837     //print '----' . PHP_EOL;
00838     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00839     <test>
00840       <i class="odd" id="one"/>
00841       <i class="even" id="two"/>
00842       <i class="odd" id="three"/>
00843       <i class="even" id="four">
00844         <i class="odd" id="inner-one"/>
00845         <i class="even" id="inner-two"/>
00846         <i class="odd" id="inner-three"/>
00847         <i class="even" id="inner-four"/>
00848       </i>
00849       <i class="odd" id="five"/>
00850       <e class="even" id="six"/>
00851     </test>';
00852     $doc = new DomDocument();
00853     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00854     
00855     // Test single last child.
00856     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00857     $handler->find('#four > i:last-child');
00858     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00859     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
00860     $this->assertEquals('inner-four', $this->nthMatch($matches, 0)->getAttribute('id'));
00861     
00862     // Test for two last children
00863     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00864     $handler->find('i:last-child');
00865     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00866     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00867     $this->assertEquals('inner-four', $this->nthMatch($matches, 0)->getAttribute('id'));
00868     $this->assertEquals('five', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00869   }

00871   public function testPseudoClassNthLastChild() {
00872     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
00873     <test>
00874       <i class="odd" id="one"/>
00875       <i class="even" id="two"/>
00876       <i class="odd" id="three"/>
00877       <i class="even" id="four">
00878         <i class="odd" id="inner-one"/>
00879         <i class="even" id="inner-two"/>
00880         <i class="odd" id="inner-three"/>
00881         <i class="even" id="inner-four"/>
00882       </i>
00883       <i class="odd" id="five"/>
00884       <e class="even" id="six"/>
00885     </test>';
00886     $doc = new DomDocument();
00887     $doc->loadXML($xml);
00888     
00889     // Test alternate rows from the end.
00890     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00891     $handler->find('#four > i:nth-last-child(odd)');
00892     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00893     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00894     $this->assertEquals('inner-two', $this->nthMatch($matches, 0)->getAttribute('id'));
00895     $this->assertEquals('inner-four', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00896     
00897     // According to spec, this should be last two elements.
00898     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
00899     $handler->find('#four > i:nth-last-child(-1n+2)');
00900     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
00901     //print $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id');
00902     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
00903     $this->assertEquals('inner-three', $this->nthMatch($matches, 0)->getAttribute('id'));
00904     $this->assertEquals('inner-four', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
00905   }

01002   public function testPseudoClassEmpty() {

01007     </test>';

01010

01012     $handler->find('n:empty');
01013     $matches = $handler->getMatches();

01015     $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01016

01018     $handler->find('i:empty');
01019     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01020     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01021     $this->assertEquals('two', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01022   }

01134   public function testPseudoClassFormElements() {
01135     $form = array('text', 'radio', 'checkbox', 'button', 'password');
01136     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
01137     <test>
01138       <input type="%s" class="odd" id="one"/>
01139     </test>';
01140     
01141     foreach ($form as $item) {
01142       $doc = new DomDocument();
01143       $doc->loadXML(sprintf($xml, $item));
01144       
01145       $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01146       $handler->find(':' . $item);
01147       $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01148       $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01149       $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01150     }
01151   }
01152   
01153   public function testPseudoClassHeader() {
01154     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
01155     <test>
01156       <h1 class="odd" id="one"/>
01157       <h2 class="even" id="two"/>
01158       <h6 class="odd" id="three"/>
01159     </test>';
01160     $doc = new DomDocument();
01161     $doc->loadXML($xml);
01162     
01163     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01164     $handler->find('test :header');
01165     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01166     $this->assertEquals(3, $matches->count());
01167     $this->assertEquals('three', $this->nthMatch($matches, 2)->getAttribute('id'));
01168   }
01169   
01170   public function testPseudoClassContains() {
01171     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
01172     <test>
01173       <p id="one">This is text.</p>
01174       <p id="two"><i>More text</i></p>
01175     </test>';
01176     $doc = new DomDocument();
01177     $doc->loadXML($xml);
01178     
01179     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01180     $handler->find('p:contains(This is text.)');
01181     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01182     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01183     $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01184     
01185     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01186     $handler->find('* :contains(More text)');
01187     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01188     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count(), 'Matches two instance of same text?');
01189     $this->assertEquals('two', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01190     
01191     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01192     $handler->find('p:contains("This is text.")');
01193     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01194     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count(), 'Quoted text matches unquoted pcdata');
01195     $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01196     
01197     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01198     $handler->find('p:contains(\\\'This is text.\\\')');
01199     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01200     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count(), 'One match for quoted string.');
01201     $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01202     
01203     // Test for issue #32
01204     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01205     $handler->find('p:contains(text)');
01206     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01207     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count(), 'Two matches for fragment of string.');
01208     $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01209     
01210   }
01211   
01212   public function testPseudoClassContainsExactly() {
01213     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
01214     <test>
01215       <p id="one">This is text.</p>
01216       <p id="two"><i>More text</i></p>
01217     </test>';
01218     $doc = new DomDocument();
01219     $doc->loadXML($xml);
01220     
01221     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01222     $handler->find('p:contains(This is text.)');
01223     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01224     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01225     $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01226     
01227     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01228     $handler->find('* :contains(More text)');
01229     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01230     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count(), 'Matches two instance of same text.');
01231     $this->assertEquals('two', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01232     
01233     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01234     $handler->find('p:contains("This is text.")');
01235     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01236     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count(), 'Quoted text matches unquoted pcdata');
01237     $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01238     
01239     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01240     $handler->find('p:contains(\\\'This is text.\\\')');
01241     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01242     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count(), 'One match for quoted string.');
01243     $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01244   }

01264   public function testPseudoClassNot() {
01265      $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
01266       <test>
01267         <outer id="one">
01268           <inner/>
01269         </outer>
01270         <outer id="two" class="notMe"/>
01271       </test>';
01272       $doc = new DomDocument();
01273       $doc->loadXML($xml);
01274 
01275       $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01276       $handler->find('outer:not(#one)');
01277       $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01278       $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01279       $this->assertEquals('two', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01280       
01281       $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01282       $handler->find('outer:not(inner)');
01283       $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01284       $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01285       $this->assertEquals('two', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01286       
01287       $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01288       $handler->find('outer:not(.notMe)');
01289       $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01290       $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01291       $this->assertEquals('one', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01292   }

01294   public function testPseudoElement() {
01295     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
01296       <test>
01297         <outer id="one">Texts
01298         
01299         More text</outer>
01300         <outer id="two" class="notMe"/>
01301       </test>';
01302     $doc = new DomDocument();
01303     $doc->loadXML($xml);
01304 
01305     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01306     $handler->find('outer::first-letter');
01307     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01308     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01309     $this->assertEquals('T', $this->firstMatch($matches)->textContent);
01310      
01311     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01312     $handler->find('outer::first-line');
01313     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01314     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01315     $this->assertEquals('Texts', $this->firstMatch($matches)->textContent);
01316   }

01318   public function testAdjacent() {
01319     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
01320       <test>
01321         <li id="one"/><li id="two"/><li id="three">
01322           <li id="inner-one">
01323             <li id="inner-inner-one"/>
01324             <li id="inner-inner-one"/>
01325           </li>
01326           <li id="inner-two"/>
01327         </li>
01328         <li id="four"/>
01329         <li id="five"/>
01330       </test>';
01331     $doc = new DomDocument();
01332     $doc->loadXML($xml);
01333 
01334     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01335     $handler->find('#one + li');
01336     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01337     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01338     $this->assertEquals('two', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01339     
01340     // Tell it to ignore whitespace nodes.
01341     $doc->loadXML($xml, LIBXML_NOBLANKS);
01342     
01343     // Test with whitespace sensitivity weakened.
01344     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01345     $handler->find('#four + li');
01346     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01347     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01348     $this->assertEquals('five', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01349   }
01350   public function testAnotherSelector() {
01351     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
01352       <test>
01353         <li id="one"/><li id="two"/><li id="three">
01354           <li id="inner-one">
01355             <li id="inner-inner-one"/>
01356             <li id="inner-inner-one"/>
01357           </li>
01358           <li id="inner-two"/>
01359         </li>
01360         <li id="four"/>
01361         <li id="five"/>
01362       </test>';
01363     $doc = new DomDocument();
01364     $doc->loadXML($xml);
01365 
01366     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01367     $handler->find('#one, #two');
01368     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01369     //print $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id') . PHP_EOL;
01370     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
01371     $this->assertEquals('two', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
01372     
01373   }
01374   public function testSibling() {
01375     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
01376       <test>
01377         <li id="one"/><li id="two"/><li id="three">
01378           <li id="inner-one">
01379             <li id="inner-inner-one"/>
01380             <il id="inner-inner-two"/>
01381             <li id="dont-match-me"/>
01382           </li>
01383           <li id="inner-two"/>
01384         </li>
01385         <li id="four"/>
01386         <li id="five"/>
01387       </test>';
01388     $doc = new DomDocument();
01389     $doc->loadXML($xml);
01390     
01391     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01392     $handler->find('#one ~ li');
01393     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01394     //print $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id') . PHP_EOL;
01395     $this->assertEquals(4, $matches->count());
01396     $this->assertEquals('three', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
01397     
01398     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01399     $handler->find('#two ~ li');
01400     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01401     //print $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id') . PHP_EOL;
01402     $this->assertEquals(3, $matches->count());
01403     //$this->assertEquals('three', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
01404 
01405     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01406     $handler->find('#inner-one > li ~ il');
01407     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01408     //print $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id') . PHP_EOL;
01409     $this->assertEquals(1, $matches->count());
01410     $this->assertEquals('inner-inner-two', $this->firstMatch($matches)->getAttribute('id'));
01411   }
01412   
01413   public function testAnyDescendant() {
01414     $xml = '<?xml version="1.0" ?>
01415       <test>
01416         <li id="one"/><li id="two"/><li id="three">
01417           <li id="inner-one" class="foo">
01418             <li id="inner-inner-one" class="foo"/>
01419             <il id="inner-inner-two"/>
01420             <li id="dont-match-me"/>
01421           </li>
01422           <li id="inner-two"/>
01423         </li>
01424         <li id="four"/>
01425         <li id="five"/>
01426       </test>';
01427     $doc = new DomDocument();
01428     $doc->loadXML($xml);
01429     
01430     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01431     $handler->find('*');
01432     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01433     $this->assertEquals(11, $matches->count());
01434     
01435     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01436     $handler->find('*.foo');
01437     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01438     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
01439     $this->assertEquals('inner-inner-one', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
01440     
01441     $handler = new QueryPathCssEventHandler($doc);
01442     $handler->find('test > li *.foo');
01443     $matches = $handler->getMatches();
01444     $this->assertEquals(2, $matches->count());
01445     $this->assertEquals('inner-inner-one', $this->nthMatch($matches, 1)->getAttribute('id'));
01446   }
01447 }

01455   private function getMockHandler($method) {
01456     $mock = $this->getMock('TestCssEventHandler', array($method));
01457     $mock->expects($this->once())
01458       ->method($method)
01459       ->with($this->equalTo('mytest'));
01460     return $mock;
01461   }
01462   
01463   public function testElementID() {
01464     $mock = $this->getMockHandler('elementID');
01465     $parser = new CssParser('#mytest', $mock);
01466     $parser->parse();
01467     
01468   }
01469   
01470   public function testElement() {
01471     
01472     // Without namespace
01473     $mock = $this->getMockHandler('element');
01474     $parser = new CssParser('mytest', $mock);
01475     $parser->parse();
01476     
01477     // With empty namespace
01478     $mock = $this->getMockHandler('element');
01479     $parser = new CssParser('|mytest', $mock);
01480     $parser->parse();
01481   }
01482   
01483   public function testElementNS() {

01486       ->method('elementNS')
01487       ->with($this->equalTo('mytest'), $this->equalTo('myns'));
01488

01490     $parser->parse();
01491     
01492     $mock = $this->getMock('TestCssEventHandler', array('elementNS'));
01493     $mock->expects($this->once())
01494       ->method('elementNS')
01495       ->with($this->equalTo('mytest'), $this->equalTo('*'));
01496     
01497     $parser = new CssParser('*|mytest', $mock);
01498     $parser->parse();
01499     
01500     $mock = $this->getMock('TestCssEventHandler', array('anyElementInNS'));
01501     $mock->expects($this->once())
01502       ->method('anyElementInNS')
01503       ->with($this->equalTo('*'));
01504     
01505     $parser = new CssParser('*|*', $mock);
01506     $parser->parse();
01507   }

01632   /**
01633    * @expectedException CSSParseException
01634    */
01635   public function testIllegalAttribute() {
01636     
01637     // Note that this is designed to test throwError() as well as 
01638     // bad selector handling.
01639     
01640     $parser = new CssParser('[test=~far]', new TestCssEventHandler());
01641     try {
01642       $parser->parse();
01643     }
01644     catch (Exception $e) {
01645       //print $e->getMessage();
01646       throw $e;
01647     }
01648   }
01649   
01650   public function testAttribute() {
01651     $selectors = array(
01652       'element[attr]' => 'attr',
01653       '*[attr]' => 'attr',
01654       'element[attr]:class' => 'attr',
01655       'element[attr2]' => 'attr2', // Issue #
01656     );
01657     foreach ($selectors as $filter => $expected) {
01658       $mock = $this->getMock('TestCssEventHandler', array('attribute'));
01659       $mock->expects($this->once())
01660         ->method('attribute')
01661         ->with($this->equalTo($expected));
01662 
01663       $parser = new CssParser($filter, $mock);
01664       $parser->parse();
01665     }
01666     
01667     $selectors = array(
01668       '*[attr="value"]' => array('attr','value',CssEventHandler::isExactly),
01669       '*[attr^="value"]' => array('attr','value',CssEventHandler::beginsWith),
01670       '*[attr$="value"]' => array('attr','value',CssEventHandler::endsWith),
01671       '*[attr*="value"]' => array('attr','value',CssEventHandler::containsInString),
01672       '*[attr~="value"]' => array('attr','value',CssEventHandler::containsWithSpace),
01673       '*[attr|="value"]' => array('attr','value',CssEventHandler::containsWithHyphen),
01674       
01675       // This should act like [attr="value"]
01676       '*[|attr="value"]' => array('attr', 'value', CssEventHandler::isExactly),
01677       
01678       // This behavior is displayed in the spec, but not accounted for in the 
01679       // grammar:
01680       '*[attr=value]' => array('attr','value',CssEventHandler::isExactly),
01681       
01682       // Should be able to escape chars using backslash.
01683       '*[attr="\.value"]' => array('attr','.value',CssEventHandler::isExactly),
01684       '*[attr="\.\]\]\]"]' => array('attr','.]]]',CssEventHandler::isExactly),
01685       
01686       // Backslash-backslash should resolve to single backslash.
01687       '*[attr="\\\c"]' => array('attr','\\c',CssEventHandler::isExactly),
01688       
01689       // Should return an empty value. It seems, though, that a value should be
01690       // passed here.
01691       '*[attr=""]' => array('attr','',CssEventHandler::isExactly),
01692     );
01693     foreach ($selectors as $filter => $expected) {
01694       $mock = $this->getMock('TestCssEventHandler', array('attribute'));
01695       $mock->expects($this->once())
01696         ->method('attribute')
01697         ->with($this->equalTo($expected[0]), $this->equalTo($expected[1]), $this->equalTo($expected[2]));
01698 
01699       $parser = new CssParser($filter, $mock);
01700       $parser->parse();
01701     }
01702   }
01703     
01704   public function testAttributeNS() {
01705     $selectors = array(
01706       '*[ns|attr="value"]' => array('attr', 'ns', 'value',CssEventHandler::isExactly),
01707       '*[*|attr^="value"]' => array('attr', '*', 'value',CssEventHandler::beginsWith),
01708       '*[*|attr|="value"]' => array('attr', '*', 'value',CssEventHandler::containsWithHyphen),
01709     );
01710     
01711     foreach ($selectors as $filter => $expected) {
01712       $mock = $this->getMock('TestCssEventHandler', array('attributeNS'));
01713       $mock->expects($this->once())
01714         ->method('attributeNS')
01715         ->with($this->equalTo($expected[0]), $this->equalTo($expected[1]), $this->equalTo($expected[2]), $this->equalTo($expected[3]));
01716 
01717       $parser = new CssParser($filter, $mock);
01718       $parser->parse();
01719     }
01720   }
01721   
01722   // Test things that should break...
01723   
01724   /**
01725    * @expectedException CssParseException
01726    */
01727   public function testIllegalCombinators1() {
01728     $handler = new TestCssEventHandler();
01729     $parser = new CssParser('ele1 > > ele2', $handler);
01730     $parser->parse();
01731   }
01732   
01733   /**
01734    * @expectedException CssParseException
01735    */
01736   public function testIllegalCombinators2() {
01737     $handler = new TestCssEventHandler();
01738     $parser = new CssParser('ele1+ ,ele2', $handler);
01739     $parser->parse();
01740   }
01741   
01742   /**
01743    * @expectedException CssParseException
01744    */
01745   public function testIllegalID() {
01746     $handler = new TestCssEventHandler();
01747     $parser = new CssParser('##ID', $handler);
01748     $parser->parse();
01749   }
01750   
01751   // Test combinations
01752   
01753   public function testElementNSClassAndAttribute() {
01754     
01755     $expect = array(
01756       new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementNS, 'element', 'ns'),
01757       new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementClass, 'class'),
01758       new TestEvent(TestEvent::attribute, 'name', 'value', CssEventHandler::isExactly),
01759     );
01760     $selector = 'ns|element.class[name="value"]';
01761     
01762     $handler = new TestCssEventHandler();
01763     $handler->expects($expect);
01764     $parser = new CssParser($selector, $handler);
01765     $parser->parse();
01766     $this->assertTrue($handler->success());
01767     
01768     // Again, with spaces this time:
01769     $selector = ' ns|element. class[  name = "value" ]';
01770     
01771     $handler = new TestCssEventHandler();
01772     $handler->expects($expect);
01773     $parser = new CssParser($selector, $handler);
01774     $parser->parse();
01775     
01776     //$handler->dumpStack();
01777     $this->assertTrue($handler->success());
01778   }
01779   
01780   public function testAllCombo() {
01781 
01782     $selector = '*|ele1 > ele2.class1 + ns1|ele3.class2[attr=simple] ~ 
01783      .class2[attr2~="longer string of text."]:pseudoClass(value) 
01784      .class3::pseudoElement';    
01785     $expect = array(
01786       new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementNS, 'ele1', '*'),
01787       new TestEvent(TestEvent::directDescendant),
01788       new TestEvent(TestEvent::element, 'ele2'),
01789       new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementClass, 'class1'),
01790       new TestEvent(TestEvent::adjacent),
01791       new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementNS, 'ele3', 'ns1'),
01792       new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementClass, 'class2'),
01793       new TestEvent(TestEvent::attribute, 'attr', 'simple', CssEventHandler::isExactly),
01794       new TestEvent(TestEvent::sibling),
01795       new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementClass, 'class2'),
01796       new TestEvent(TestEvent::attribute, 'attr2', 'longer string of text.', CssEventHandler::containsWithSpace),
01797       new TestEvent(TestEvent::pseudoClass, 'pseudoClass', 'value'),
01798       new TestEvent(TestEvent::anyDescendant),
01799       new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementClass, 'class3'),
01800       new TestEvent(TestEvent::pseudoElement, 'pseudoElement'),
01801     );
01802 
01803     
01804     $handler = new TestCssEventHandler();
01805     $handler->expects($expect);
01806     $parser = new CssParser($selector, $handler);
01807     $parser->parse();
01808     
01809     //$handler->dumpStack();
01810     
01811     $this->assertTrue($handler->success());
01812     
01813     /*
01814     // Again, with spaces this time:
01815     $selector = ' *|ele1 > ele2. class1 + ns1|ele3. class2[ attr=simple] ~ .class2[attr2 ~= "longer string of text."]:pseudoClass(value) .class3::pseudoElement';    
01816      
01817     $handler = new TestCssEventHandler();
01818     $handler->expects($expect);
01819     $parser = new CssParser($selector, $handler);
01820     $parser->parse();
01821     
01822     $handler->dumpStack();
01823     $this->assertTrue($handler->success());
01824     */
01825   }
01826 }

01828 /**
01829  * Testing harness for the CssEventHandler.
01830  *
01831  * @ingroup querypath_tests
01832  */
01833 class TestCssEventHandler implements CssEventHandler {
01834   var $stack = NULL;
01835   var $expect = array();
01836   
01837   public function __construct() {
01838     $this->stack = array();
01839   }
01840   
01841   public function getStack() {
01842     return $this->stack;
01843   }
01844   
01845   public function dumpStack() {
01846     print "\nExpected:\n";
01847     $format = "Element %d: %s\n";
01848     foreach ($this->expect as $item) {
01849       printf($format, $item->eventType(), implode(',', $item->params()));
01850     }
01851     
01852     print "Got:\n";
01853     foreach($this->stack as $item){
01854       printf($format, $item->eventType(), implode(',', $item->params()));
01855     }
01856   }
01857   
01858   public function expects($stack) {
01859     $this->expect = $stack;
01860   }
01861   
01862   public function success() {
01863     return ($this->expect == $this->stack);
01864   }
01865   
01866   public function elementID($id) {
01867     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementID, $id);
01868   }
01869   public function element($name) {
01870     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::element, $name);
01871   }
01872   public function elementNS($name, $namespace = NULL){
01873     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementNS, $name, $namespace);
01874   }
01875   public function anyElement(){
01876     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::anyElement);
01877   }
01878   public function anyElementInNS($ns){
01879     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::anyElementInNS, $ns);
01880   }
01881   public function elementClass($name){
01882     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementClass, $name);
01883   }
01884   public function attribute($name, $value = NULL, $operation = CssEventHandler::isExactly){
01885     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::attribute, $name, $value, $operation);
01886   }
01887   public function attributeNS($name, $ns, $value = NULL, $operation = CssEventHandler::isExactly){
01888     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::attributeNS, $name, $ns, $value, $operation);
01889   }
01890   public function pseudoClass($name, $value = NULL){
01891     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::pseudoClass, $name, $value);
01892   }
01893   public function pseudoElement($name){
01894     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::pseudoElement, $name);
01895   }
01896   public function directDescendant(){
01897     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::directDescendant);
01898   }
01899   public function anyDescendant() {
01900     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::anyDescendant);
01901   }
01902   public function adjacent(){
01903     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::adjacent);
01904   }
01905   public function anotherSelector(){
01906     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::anotherSelector);
01907   }
01908   public function sibling(){
01909     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::sibling);
01910   }
01911 }
01912 
01913 /**
01914  * Simple utility object for use with the TestCssEventHandler.
01915  *
01916  * @ingroup querypath_tests
01917  */
01918 class TestEvent {
01919   const elementID = 0;
01920   const element = 1;
01921   const elementNS = 2;
01922   const anyElement = 3;
01923   const elementClass = 4;
01924   const attribute = 5;
01925   const attributeNS = 6;
01926   const pseudoClass = 7;
01927   const pseudoElement = 8;
01928   const directDescendant = 9;
01929   const adjacent = 10;
01930   const anotherSelector = 11;
01931   const sibling = 12;
01932   const anyElementInNS = 13;
01933   const anyDescendant = 14;
01934   
01935   var $type = NULL;
01936   var $params = NULL;
01937   
01938   public function __construct($event_type) {
01939     $this->type = $event_type;
01940     $args = func_get_args();
01941     array_shift($args);
01942     $this->params = $args;
01943   }
01944   
01945   public function eventType() {
01946     return $this->type;
01947   }
01948   
01949   public function params() {
01950     return $this->params;
01951   }
01952 }
